action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A snowy outdoor scene with a yellow fire hydrant in the center. There are dry, leafless branches in the foreground. A dog with thick fur is partially visible on the right side of the image. Trees with no leaves are in the background, and the sky is clear and blue.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a snowy outdoor scene with a yellow fire hydrant in the center. There are dry, leafless branches and twigs in the foreground. In the background, there are trees with some green foliage. A large, furry animal, possibly a dog, is partially visible on the right side of the image. The sky is clear and blue.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A snowy outdoor scene with a yellow fire hydrant in the center. There are dry, leafless branches in the foreground. A dog with thick fur is partially visible on the right side of the image. Trees with no leaves are in the background, and the sky is clear and blue.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any trees with green foliage in the background of your image?

In the background, there are trees with some green foliage. A large, furry animal, possibly a dog, is partially visible on the right side of the image. The sky is clear and blue.
QUESTION: Are there any trees with green foliage in the background of your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the dog in your image positioned to the right of the fire hydrant?

ANSWER: Yes
QUESTION: Is the dog in your image positioned to the right of the fire hydrant? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
